citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:25-2:55 pm on
March 15, 2022.
Arrived at facility knock on office door, called out for license, honked horn and called both listed numbers and left
message.
End Section

narrative:

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.

March 15, 2022. 
Arrived at facility knock on office door, called out for license, honked horn and called both listed numbers and left 
message.
